alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued December 02 at 1:47PM CST until December 02 at 2:45PM CST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A DUST STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 PM MST/245 PM CST/ FOR CHEYENNE COUNTY IN NORTHWESTERN KANSAS AND DUNDY COUNTIES IN SOUTHWESTERN NEBRASKA... At 1246 PM MST/146 PM CST/, a wall of dust was along a line extending from 4 miles north of Stratton to 8 miles southeast of Benkelman to 13 miles south of St. Francis, moving southeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Less than one quarter mile visibility. SOURCE...Doppler radar, public reports and satellite imagery. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. This dust channel will remain over mainly rural areas of Cheyenne County in northwestern Kansas and Dundy Counties in southwestern Nebraska, including the following locations... Parks, Wheeler and Max. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Motorists should not drive into a dust storm. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!
